Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes a public online registry of vacant commercial storefronts
Summary: Establishes a public online registry of vacant commercial storefronts; provides information to current and prospective small business owners seeking to purchase or lease a vacant storefront for a small business location.
LawCode: Amd ยง134, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing a public online registry of vacant commercial storefronts
